11 撕裂 sī liè to tear
微小 wéixiǎo small
损伤 sǔnshāng damage

补充 bǔchōng Replenish

覆盖面 fùgàimiàn cover area

建议大家从第1课开始按顺序看 It is recommended that you start from Lesson 1 and read in order
我们从这里额开始 we start here
就要踏出正式增重的第一步了 It's about to take the first step in officially gaining weight.
开始增肌训练 start muscle training
也就是，我们要去健身房撸铁了 That is, we're going to the gym to get some iron
但是为什么撸铁就能够长肌肉呢？ But why can you grow muscles by pulling iron?
为什么健身房里的人虽然都挺状？ Why are the people in the gym all in shape?
但是有的身材很好看 But some are beautiful
有的不好看呢？ Some are not good-looking?
在开始动手之前 before starting
我们要先花一节课的时间 We're going to spend a class first
来简单搞懂一下 let's understand
肌肉是怎么增长的 how muscle grows
肌肉的增长 muscle growth
总给来就四个字 Always give me four words
超量恢复 over recovery
超量恢复就是这么个曲线 Excessive recovery is such a curve
当你开始运动的时候 when you start exercising
由于你有运动消耗 Because you have exercise consumption
你的相关指标就会一直的往下降 Your related indicators will keep going down.
那么运动结束之后呢？ So what about after the workout?
你的相关指标就会恢复到原来的水平 Your related metrics will return to their original levels.
而且还会超越原来的水平 And it will go beyond the original level
达到更高的水平 reach a higher level
这个部分我们就叫做超量恢复 We call this part overrecovery
我们的肌肉是有很多肌纤维组成的 Our muscles are made up of many muscle fibers
当你进行力量训练的时候 when you strength train
你要举起一个哑铃 you're going to lift a dumbbell
肌肉就要收缩 muscle contraction
本质上就是里面的肌纤维在收缩 Essentially, the muscle fibers inside are contracting.
而在这个收缩的过程中 And in the process of shrinking
由于肌纤维承受的压力很大 Due to the stress on the muscle fibers
这个肌纤维他就会撕裂 He will tear this muscle fiber
这个肌纤维撕裂听起来很可怕 This muscle fiber tear sounds scary
其实是非常微小的肌肉损伤 It's actually a very small muscle injury.
撕裂的过程你是没有感觉的 You don't feel the tearing process
训练结束后 after training
撕裂的肌纤维就会自己修复 Torn muscle fibers repair themselves
而这个肌纤维的修复 And the repair of this muscle fiber
不仅仅会恢复成撕裂前的样子 Not only will it return to the way it was before it was torn
它还会进行超量恢复 It also performs overrecovery
变得比原来要更大 become bigger than before
肌纤维是组成肌肉的基础单位 Muscle fiber is the basic unit of muscle
肌纤维的体积变大了 Increased muscle fiber size
那么肌肉的体积当然也就会变大 Then the muscle volume will of course increase
除了肌纤维撕裂后的超量恢复 In addition to super recovery after muscle fiber tear
还有肌肉中储存物质的超量恢复 and the excess recovery of stored substances in the muscles
例如说肌糖原之类的 like muscle glycogen
都能够让肌肉看起来更大 make muscles look bigger
而且涉及到机械长力，代谢压力 And it involves mechanical long force, metabolic stress
和肌肉损伤三种方式 and muscle damage in three ways
但这些道理都是一样的 But the principles are the same
我们就先不讲太细 let's not go into too much detail
我们只需要知道 we just need to know
通过力量训练 through strength training
不断的刺激肌肉 constant muscle stimulation
让肌纤维撕裂 tear the muscle fibers
让肌糖原消耗然后补充足够的营养 Let muscle glycogen be consumed and then supplement with sufficient nutrition
让肌肉进行恢复 allow the muscles to recover
而且是超量恢复 And it's overrecovery
肌肉就慢慢变大了 Muscles are getting bigger
虽然肌肉变大了 Although the muscles become larger
但是能不能让你看起来变状了呢？ But can it make you look transformed?
这个是需要认真考虑的问题 This is a question that needs serious consideration
例如说你把腹肌练得很大 Say for example you built your abs big
但是整体看起来你还是个瘦子啊 But overall you still look skinny.
所以说，我们要重点考虑的是： So, what we need to focus on is:
瘦子增肌要怎么做 How to build muscle for skinny people
速度最快 the fastest
最容易显状 Easiest to show
瘦子练状，第一个重点 Thin people practice shape, the first focus
我们要优先把大肌群给练起来 We need to give priority to training the large muscle groups
身体表层的肌肉非常多 There are many muscles on the surface of the body
我们可以按肌肉的占比 According to the proportion of muscle
简单划分为两个部分 Divide simply into two parts
其中胸部，背部和臀腿 including chest, back and buttocks
这些体积大，覆盖面广的肌肉 These bulky, broad-covering muscles
我们称为大肌群 what we call the large muscle groups
剩下肩部，手臂，腰腹，小腿 Left shoulders, arms, waist, calves
体积比较小，我们可以称为小肌群 Relatively small in size, we can call it a small muscle group
为什么我们要先把大肌群给练好？ Why do we need to train the large muscle groups first?
一方面，大肌群的肌肉量占比大 On the one hand, large muscle groups account for a large proportion of muscle mass
如果你要参加高考 if you want to take the college entrance examination
要用最快的方式提升成绩 Improve performance in the fastest way
应该怎么做？ What should be done?
特别是腹肌，新手不要太沉迷 Especially the abdominal muscles, novices should not be too obsessed
很多体脂比较低的瘦子 Many skinny people with low body fat
都有清晰的八块腹肌（分析） Both have clear eight-pack abs (analysis)
但是整体还是看起来还是一个瘦子 But overall he still looks skinny
所以我们前期要先集中精力把大肌群练好 So we have to focus on training the large fleet in the early stage
整体练壮了，再回过头来重点关照小肌群 When the overall training is strong, turn around and focus on the small muscle groups
这样效率是最高的 This is the most efficient
但这里有一个例外 But here is an exception
就是肩部的三角肌 the deltoid muscle of the shoulder
虽然肩部从体积上看也属于小肌群 Although the shoulder is also a small muscle group in terms of volume
但是由于这块肌肉长在身体的两侧 But since this muscle grows on both sides of the body
练大了，从正面看人会马上变宽 When you practice big, people will immediately become wider when viewed from the front
效果也非常好 The effect is also very good
所以肩部，也可以和大肌群一样 So the shoulders can also be the same as the large muscle groups
在前期安排优先的训练 Schedule priority training up front
另一方面 on the other hand
大肌群的训练，会带到小肌群 The training of large machine groups will bring small muscle groups
大部分练胸，练背的动作 Most chest and back exercises
手臂都是有一起参加发力的 The arms are all involved in exerting force together.
都会被顺带练到 will be trained by the way
而很多练臀腿的动作 And a lot of hip and leg movements
由于对核心稳定的要求非常高 Due to the very high requirements for core stability
腰腹核心肌群 Waist core muscles
包含了你们很关心的腹肌 Contains the abdominal muscles that you care about
都是会被一起练到的 will be practiced together
所以不用担心前期重点训练大肌群 So don't worry about training large muscle groups in the early stage
小肌群会不会落后太多的情况，不会的 Will the small muscle groups fall behind too much, no
大肌群的训练通常会带到小肌群 Large group training usually brings small muscle groups
只要你的大肌群练好了 As long as your large fleet is well trained
小肌群不会差到哪里去 Small muscle groups will not be worse
瘦子练状，第二个重点 Thin people practice shape, the second key point
就是要使用大重量 is to use heavy weight
当然这个大重量是相对的 Of course, this large weight is relative
大家不要一看到大重量就觉得搞不动 Everyone, don’t think you can’t handle it when you see a big weight
觉得会受伤 feel hurt
一般来说 Generally speaking
一口气能做5~10个左右的重量 Can do about 5-10 weights in one breath
对初级健身者来说就足够了 Enough for Beginner Bodybuilders
这样的重量 such a weight
通过练习你完全可以驾驭得了 With practice you can master it
为什么一定要使用大重量呢？ Why do you have to use heavy weights?
我用小重量行不行？ Can I use a small weight?
或者说我就不做力量训练 Or I don't do strength training
我去跑步，游泳，打球行不行？ Can I go for a run, swim, or play ball?
反正都是运动 It's all about sports
这个问题，和肌纤维的类型有关 This question is related to the type of muscle fiber
I 型肌纤维：红肌纤维 Type I muscle fibers: red muscle fibers
II 型肌纤维：白肌纤维 Type II muscle fibers: white muscle fibers
力量小，耐力强，体积小，体积增长潜力小 Low strength, great stamina, small size, little potential for volume growth
例如说慢跑 eg jogging
那些跑马拉松的选手，耐力很好 Runners who run marathons have good stamina
一口气可以跑四十多公里 Can run more than 40 kilometers in one breath
肌肉肯定会比一段人要强 Muscles will definitely be stronger than a section of people
但是他们整体看起来却很瘦 But they look thin overall
好像没有什么肌肉的样子 Looks like there are no muscles
其实是因为他们的红肌纤维比较发达 In fact, because their red muscle fibers are more developed
但是红肌纤维的体积比较小 but red muscle fibers are smaller
表面上看不太出来 It's not obvious on the surface
这类型的肌纤维 This type of muscle fiber
就是专门负责力量型，爆发型的运动 It is specifically responsible for strength and explosive sports
例如说同样是跑步 For example, the same is running
短跑运动员的白肌纤维就非常发达 The white muscle fibers of sprinters are very developed
因为他们需要爆发力 because they need explosive power
他们的腿部也比长跑运动员要粗状很多 Their legs are also much thicker than long-distance runners
这也是因为白肌纤维体积大的原因 This is also due to the large size of white muscle fibers
那我们瘦子要尽快便状 Then we skinny people have to poop as soon as possible
当然就是要优先把体积大 Of course, it is necessary to give priority to the large size
力量大的白肌纤维给练起来 Strong white muscle fibers are trained
效果才最好 The effect is the best
白肌纤维的力量大 The strength of white muscle fibers
我们当然就要按照白肌纤维的特性 Of course, we must follow the characteristics of white muscle fibers
去安排大重量的训练 to arrange heavy weight training
才能充分的把白肌纤维给刺激到位 In order to fully stimulate the white muscle fibers in place
所以，对我们瘦子来说 So, for us skinny
负重的力量训练 weight-bearing strength training
是促进肌肉生长的最佳训练方式 Is the best training method to promote muscle growth
为什么说一定要举铁才能增肌 Why You Need To Lift Iron To Build Muscle
像跑步，游泳这些运动不太能 Exercises like running and swimming are not
其实不是不能 Actually it's not impossible
只不过使用的肌纤维类型不一样 It's just that the type of muscle fiber used is different
出的效果也不一样 The effect is also different
瘦子练状，第三个重点 Thin people practice shape, the third key point
要多练复合动作 Do more compound movements
因为复合动作 Because compound action
可以同时满足以上两个条件 The above two conditions can be satisfied at the same time
大肌群带到小肌群 large muscle group to small muscle group
和使用大重量训练 and use heavy weight training
负重训练的动作可以分为两种类型 Weight training exercises can be divided into two types
复合动作和孤立动作 compound and isolation exercises
复合动作，就是要同时用到多块肌肉 Compound movements involve using more than one muscle at the same time
多个关节一起运动的动作 Actions in which multiple joints move together
例如说卧推 e.g. bench press
推举 press
俯卧撑 push ups
可以同时练到胸部，肩部前束和手臂的肱三头肌 Works the chest, front shoulders, and triceps of the arms at the same time
例如说引体向上 pull-ups
划船 boating
可以同时练到背部和手臂的肱二头肌 Works the biceps of the back and arms at the same time
深蹲可以同时练到大腿的前侧，后侧和臀部 Squats work the front of the thighs, back and butt at the same time
对腰腹的核心也有刺激 It also stimulates the core of the waist and abdomen
而硬拉就更厉害了 And the deadlift is even stronger
除了整个臀部和腿部 Except for the entire buttocks and legs
腰腹核心，背部 Abdominal core, back
甚至前臀都有一定的刺激 Even the front buttocks have some stimulation
可以看到这些复合动作 You can see these compound actions
其实都是大肌群主导的动作 In fact, they are all movements dominated by large muscle groups.
但是也都能练到小肌群 But it can also train small muscle groups
所以效率非常高 so very efficient
前面说的通过大肌群训练带上小肌群 As mentioned earlier, bring small muscle groups through large muscle group training
也就是指这些复合动作 That is to say, these compound actions
复合动作由于参与的肌肉多 Compound movements involve more muscles
所以力量一般很大 So the power is generally great
非常适合进行大重量训练 Great for heavy training
这对我们的力量水平提升也非常有帮助 It's also very helpful for our strength levels
所以我们的训练 So our training
特别是新手阶段 especially for beginners
应该以复合动作为主要的训练 Compound movements should be the main training
而孤立动作 while isolated action
就是几乎只需要用到一块肌肉发力的单关节运动 It is a single-joint movement that almost only needs to use one muscle to exert force
例如说手臂的弯举 For example, the curl of the arm
只有肘关节在动 Only the elbow joint moves
能练到肱二头肌这一块肌肉 Can exercise the biceps muscle
练肩部中束的侧平举 Practicing lateral raises of the middle beam of the shoulders
只有肩关节在动 Only the shoulder joint is moving
这些孤立动作 these isolated movements
相对来说效率低一下 relatively less efficient
只能够使用比较小的重量 Can only use relatively small weight
一次只能够刺激一块肌肉 Can only stimulate one muscle at a time
肯定是没有复合动作的增肌效果好 It must be that there is no muscle-building effect of compound movements.
但是孤立训练也非常重要 But isolation training is also very important
有些复合动作覆盖不到的地方 Some places that compound actions cannot cover
或者你需要特别加强的地方 Or where you need special reinforcement
例如说三角肌的中束 For example, the middle bundle of the deltoid muscle
能够让你的肩显得更宽 Can make your shoulders appear wider
就可以用孤立动作进行补充 can be supplemented with isolation movements
所以侧平举这个动作我们会练的比较多 So we will practice more lateral lifts.
瘦子增肌，最后一个要点 Lean Gainer, One Last Point
优先选择自由重量 Prefer free weights
很多新手刚开始训练喜欢用固定器械 Many novices like to use fixed equipment when they start training
因为轨迹固定 Because the trajectory is fixed
上手更容易 easier to get started
看起来也要安全 look safe too
实际上我们更推存主要使用自由重量进行训练 We actually recommend training primarily with free weights
也就是杠铃和哑铃 That's barbells and dumbbells
自由重量的效果会比固定器械要更好 Free weights work better than stationary machines
一方面，是肌肉的受力范围 On the one hand, it is the force range of the muscle
固定器械的动作轨迹太单一了 The movement track of the fixed equipment is too single
只能够刺激到某块肌肉的某个局部 Can only stimulate a certain part of a muscle
而每个人的身体比例不一样 Everyone's body proportions are different
这个轨迹末必是最适合你的 This trajectory must be the most suitable for you
这个你是没有办法调整的 You can't adjust this
而杠铃哑铃 while barbells and dumbbells
随时可以微调手臂的角度 The angle of the arm can be fine-tuned at any time
找到最适合自己的角度 find the angle that suits you best
给肌肉最充分的刺激 Give the muscles the most stimulation
另一方面，是安全性 On the other hand, security
看起来，好像是固定器械更安全 It seems that fixed equipment is safer
因为轨迹固定了，很稳定 Because the trajectory is fixed, it is very stable
但长远来说 but in the long run
你会开始依赖固定器械的稳定性 you'll start to depend on the stability of the immobilizer
自己反而没有办法学会控制肌肉的稳定性 On the contrary, there is no way to learn to control the stability of the muscles
等哪天你从固定器械换上自由重量 Wait until the day you switch from fixed machines to free weights
由于控制能力太差 Due to poor control
反而可能马上会受伤 On the contrary, it may be injured immediately
合理的方法 reasonable method
应该是从最轻的自由重量开始练 You should start with the lightest free weight
刚开始使用杠铃哑铃 Just getting started with barbells and dumbbells
你的动作会感觉非常不稳 Your movements will feel very unsteady
摇摇晃晃 wobbly
这是很正常的 it's normal
你还没有学会控制肌肉的稳定性 You haven't learned to control the stability of your muscles
但是由于你的重量很小 But since your weight is so small
所以你不用担心会受伤 so you don't have to worry about getting hurt
等你多练几次 wait for you to practice more
动作控制的很稳了 Movement control is very stable
在逐步循序渐进的增加重量 Gradually increase weight
你就会发现 you will find
你已经充分掌握了控制肌肉稳定的方法 You've mastered the art of controlling muscle stabilization
重量大一点也可以控制住 Can control the weight
这样反而是最安全的 This is the safest
等你把自由器械玩熟练的 Waiting for you to play free equipment proficiently
再换成固定器械 Replace with a fixed device
你会发现 you will find
固定器械实在是太简单了 It's really easy to fix the equipment
OK，今天讲的有点多 OK, I've talked a lot today
主要是比较零碎 mainly fragmentary
这里给大家总结一下 Here is a summary for everyone
瘦子增肌怎么练，才能够复容易显状？ How can lean people gain muscle so that they can regain their shape easily?
四个要点 four points
第一，优先训练大肌群，顺带可以练到小机群 First, give priority to training large muscle groups, and by the way, small machine groups can be trained
第二，使用大重量训练 Second, use heavy weight training
专门刺激白肌纤维的增长 Specifically stimulates the growth of white muscle fibers
第三，以复合动作为主 Third, focus on compound movements
一次能刺激多块肌肉，效率最高 Stimulate multiple muscles at one time with the highest efficiency
第四，以自由重量 Fourth, with free weights
也就是杠铃哑铃作为主要的训练，效果最好 That is, barbell dumbbells are used as the main training, and the effect is the best.
